page.title: 08Housing_St.Martin's Parish.
page.content:
Three hundred and eighty_three people live in the part of this parish which falls within the area under consideration.
In Guildtown Village there are 112 houses. The largest is the (empty) schoolhouse. The oldest (1818) is on the Main Road. There are 73 very new/modern bungalows/council cottages, 1 council terrace (4 houses) and 39 old cottages over 75 years old _ most of which have been modernised.
In St.Martin's Village there are only 4 houses and 1 cottage occupied all the year round.
In the surrounding area there are 6 farm_houses, 7 mansions and 26 cottages. In June,85 the totals are 156 occupied and 12 empty dwellings.
